column5: Pulling out and heading for Canada in about two hours. Won't be coming back home until middle of June. We are going to fish the opening week on LOTW and the second week on Lac Seul and finish up on Red Lake including a four day fly out. This is the first time I have ever gone to Canada for that length of time. I will have three of the guys I grew up with along. Two of them retired last year and two of us retired this year and this is our retirement gift from our wives. Crown Royal, Loomis, Jigs, Crown Royal, Shimano, Stren, Crown Royal, landing net, life jacket, Crown Royal.....just packing up the last few items!!!!
17 more years and I can retire and do the same thing, Envy you right now. Have to wait 4 more weeks for our trip.
Good on you mate!!!!! Have a blast, you've earned it. Tight lines. Hopefully, 15 years from now, I'll be posting the same message.

Have a great time......I'm leaving in a couple of weeks. Teaching school allows me plenty of time to spend chasing those "eyes" during the summer. Still have a few years left before can stay out side of late May to mid Aug. Enjoy!!!
Congrats, 4 years till retirement here. Just wondering...with all them supplies, are you gonna remember the trip? :) Have fun Al
How do you tie that crown royal to your line?
Have a great time! Sounds like you earned it. Just try to leave a few fish for the rest of us! :cheers:
Have a great time !!! Good luck with handling all the fish... After five days in Canada, my hands are usually pretty beat up. Looks like you can use the Crown to num them up.....

"Two of them retired last year and two of us retired this year and this is our retirement gift from our wives." You know you have a great marriage when she doesn't care what you do, as long as she doesn't have to go along. My wife lets me spend 4 months in Canada each summer. What a gal! Congratulations on your retirement....your great taste in women....and your trip to Northwest Ontario.
